evidence.claim: Hudson Regional Hospital implements FHIR standards for interoperability and data exchange between healthcare systems.
The hospital complies with HIPAA requirements for patient data security and privacy.
HL7 messaging protocols are utilized for effective communication within their data management systems.
The hospital integrates various health information technology solutions to streamline patient care and data management.

icp.icp_reason: Hospital likely processes X12 transactions for claims and eligibility.
